name: Door Frames - Installed plumb, level and correctly fixed
Floor/Ceiling track to be secured to structure at no less than 600mm internally and 100mm from ends
Installed as per marks by other trades
All insulation tight with no gaps
Ensure LL pre sheet sign off completed - attach below if possible
Sheets need to be installed as per CSR specifications. Firewalls screwed at no more than 200mm spacings on edge and 300mm internally. Wet areas field screws at 200mm max centres.
Ensure sheets have 10-15mm gap before caulking
Ensure framing is installed as per Studco Ceiling System specifications. Perimeter tracks to be fastened at no more than 600mm centres and no more than 50mm from the stud location.
Sheets installed as per CSR specifications
All joins to Australian standard and screw holes double checked
This is to confirm M. Pirovano has carried out all necessary inspections and verifies that the work has been completed and conforms to the contract specification(s)
